Tell me about Aren Desai: [arendesai.com/portfolio] **Aren Desai** is a Computer Science & Data Science student at UW-Madison with expertise in programming, data science, and robotics. His portfolio highlights his academic background, projects, and professional experience.
What are Aren's technical skills?: [arendesai.com/portfolio] Aren is proficient in **Python, SQL, R, Java, C/C++/C#, JavaScript, Julia, MATLAB** for programming, and **Pandas, NumPy, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, Keras** for data science.
